bibl.title: Wissensvermittlung in dichterischer Gestalt
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 78 (2006), Bibl. Beilage 1, p. 18.
KÄSSER Ch., The Poet and the 'polis'. The Aetia as Didactic Poem.
Marietta HORSTER und Christiane REITZ (Hgg.), Wissensvermittlung in dichterischer Gestalt = Palingenesia. 85 (Stuttgart, 2005) pp. 95-114.
